Articles.Content:
I wanted to start off by posting some of my gameplay albums from my 0.90 install (I haven't upgraded to 1.x yet, waiting for it to settle down).

The savegame these come from is actually a Science game, but as explained in the first album, I maxed out the tech tree before leaving Kerbin's SOI, so now I'm just enjoying building ships to send on long-duration missions to the other planets, as well as amusing myself in LKO. I've embedded the imgur albums but also provided links, as I think they're much better viewed at full resolution.

Without further ado...

Album 1 - Intro & KSS 1

[http://imgur.com/a/gsjph](http://imgur.com/a/gsjph)

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/gsjph)

Album 2 - KSS 2: "Bigger is Better"

[http://imgur.com/a/MwD7F](http://imgur.com/a/MwD7F)

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/MwD7F)

More to come...

- akardam
